participants.name: Andrew Steven McVey
participants.description: Former Banquet Kitchen Supervisor at Omni Nashville Hotel

messages.message:
Length of jacket.
I wear a short because I am more hip. If you like to wear a shirt untucked  under neath then you would like short.
It's a little more modern and stylish and a little more casual. You would work with regular too but it's a little more old school.
You're not much taller than me I don't think. And it lengthens your legs and makes you look taller.

Brian
I am more old school like Big Lebowski
Regular is cool then. If in doubt Google it lol

Brian
It's your wedding, I'll get whatever you say.
40 short?
Lt Gray?

Yeah light grey
I think you'll like the short more like me. I know chase is a short.
Sounds good.

Brian
Did Chase already get his?
Yeah sounds like it. There will be another sale I understand I didn't really give enough Lee way

Brian
that's ok, I'll go in to the store and ask about sizes.
Word. Wait for a sale though. I wouldn't pay more than 300

Brian
I might try to talk them in to a discount.

Brian
Q: Why did Mickey Mouse take a trip into space?
A: He wanted to find Pluto!
